dialogue.content: Hello Alex. Thank you for coming in so quickly. I know you were close to what happened at the museum last night. Just a few routine questions to clear things up.

context.title: Modern Art Museum Theft
context.description: A valuable painting was stolen from the Modern Art Museum last night. Security cameras were disabled for 45 minutes. You are Alex Rivers, a museum guide and art enthusiast, being questioned by Inspector Martin.
context.suspect_description: Museum guide, 28 years old, art enthusiast and amateur collector. Familiar with security systems.

charges.primary_charge: Grand theft of artwork valued at 2.5 million euros

timeline.truth: Suspect meets with underground art buyer at caf√©
Suspect uses keycard to enter museum
Suspect disables security system using access code

evidence.description: Suspect's access badge used at 9:45 PM
Suspect's security code used to disable alarms
Suspect's clothing fibers found near stolen painting
Phone records showing calls to suspicious numbers
Marcus (colleague) also had access and significant debts
Recent renovation work - several external contractors familiar with building
History of security system malfunctions in recent weeks
Group of suspicious visitors spotted on afternoon of theft

inspector_personality.tone: Friendly and understanding, but becomes more insistent if inconsistencies appear
inspector_personality.strategy: Start by building trust, then ask about timeline. Easily distracted by red herrings.
